description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You're in control of virus! Complete the tasks while avoiding dangerous objects such as white blood cells. Play local or online multiplayer and race to the finish, or play one of 4 creative single player challenges.
